text: (viśvāsavantayini!) obagen yam kisivekuṭa maraṇaya ḷan̆gā vuvahot ohu vastuva (dēpaḷa) athæra damā (maraṇayaṭa pat vanneku vaśayenda) siṭiyahot (ohu tamangē) demavpiyanṭada, gnātīnṭada, sādhāraṇa andamin (dēpaḷa sēndu vana sē) antima kæmætta (maraṇa śāsanaya kīmaṭa) niyama karanu læba ættēya. (meya) bhaya bhaktikayin mata anivāryaya yutukamaki
